column1: Global Strategy and Innovation Management - MSc
column5: In today’s dynamic business environment, managers are challenged to be actively engaged in strategy initiatives while providing innovative ideas for new products, services and business models.This Masters degree will enable you to understand the fundamentals of strategy in organisations, and you’ll develop the skills to design, lead and implement all types of innovation in local and global business context.Through a combination of theoretical and practical teaching, you’ll be equipped to identify the strategies and management practices that enable firms to implement innovation initiatives.
